thread.title: Boutique Hotel in the heart of 6th
thread.title_full: Boutique Hotel in the heart of 6th - Review of Hotel des Academies et des Arts, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Eoin_OSullivan70
title: Boutique Hotel in the heart of 6th
text:
This hotel has a very convenient location just minutes walk from the Metro, easy access from Orly airport bus and with easy access to a good selection of bars and restaurants.
The hotel is small but has a nice design and atmosphere , the room we had was small but that isn't unusual in Paris. The staff were helpful and friendly.
